languages.text: "Вольный Торговец, вы же не всерьез задумались над тем, кого выбрать? Имперского навигатора или отступницу-ксеноса, которую презирают даже собственные собратья?"

traits.locale_text: "Вольный Торговец, вы же не всерьез задумались над тем, кого выбрать? имперского Навигатора или отступницу-ксеноса, которую презирают даже собственные собраться?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Rogue Trader, surely you do not consider this a difficult choice? A Navigator of the Imperium and a xenos rogue despised even by her own kind?"
languages.original_text: "Вольный Торговец, вы же не всерьез задумались над тем, кого выбрать? Имперского навигатора или отступницу-ксеноса, которую презирают даже собственные собратья?"

traits.locale_text: "Rogue Trader, surely you do not seriously consider this a difficult choice? A Navigator of the Imperium and a xenos rogue despised even by her own kind?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Rogue Trader, surely you do not consider this a difficult choice? A Navigator of the Imperium and a xenos rogue despised even by her own kind?"

traits.locale_text: "Rogue Trader, surely you do not consider this a difficult choice? A Navigator of the Imperium and a xenos rogue despised even by her own kind?"

languages.text: 「自由開拓者様、これを難しい選択と本気でお思いですか。帝国の航宙士と、同種にすら見下される異種族の放浪者のどちらを選ぶのです？」
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader, surely you do not consider this a difficult choice? A Navigator of the Imperium and a xenos rogue despised even by her own kind?"

traits.locale_text: 「自由開拓者様、これを難しい選択と本気でお思いですか。帝国の航宙士と、同種にすら見下される異種族の放浪者のどちらを選ぶのです？」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “是选择帝国的导航者，还是选择四处流浪的异形，就连她自己的族人都不待见她？这真的是个很困难的选择吗，行商浪人？”
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader, surely you do not consider this a difficult choice? A Navigator of the Imperium and a xenos rogue despised even by her own kind?"

traits.locale_text: “是选择帝国的导航者，还是选择四处流浪的异形，连她自己的族人都不待见她？行商浪人，你真的认为这是个艰难的选择吗？”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « {mf|Libre-marchand|Libre-marchande}, ne me dites pas que vous hésitez entre une navigatrice de l'Imperium et une xénos méprisée par son propre peuple ? »
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader, surely you do not consider this a difficult choice? A Navigator of the Imperium and a xenos rogue despised even by her own kind?"

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Libre-marchand|Libre-marchande}, ne me dites pas que vous hésitez entre une navigatrice de l'Imperium et une xénos méprisée par son propre peuple ? »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Comerciante Independiente, imagino que no le resultará una decisión dura. ¿Una Navegante del Imperium o una xenos renegada repudiada incluso por su propia gente?».
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader, surely you do not consider this a difficult choice? A Navigator of the Imperium and a xenos rogue despised even by her own kind?"

traits.locale_text: «Comerciante Independiente, no le resultará una decisión dura, ¿verdad? ¿Una Navegante del Imperium o una xenos renegada repudiada incluso por su propia gente?».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}, Ihr haltet das doch nicht ernsthaft für eine schwierige Entscheidung? Eine Navigatorin des Imperiums und eine Xenos-Abtrünnige, die selbst von ihrem eigenen Volk verabscheut wird?"
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader, surely you do not consider this a difficult choice? A Navigator of the Imperium and a xenos rogue despised even by her own kind?"

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}, Ihr haltet das doch nicht ernsthaft für eine schwierige Entscheidung? Eine Navigatorin des Imperiums und eine Xenos-Abtrünnige, die selbst von ihrem eigenen Volk verabscheut wird?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Hür Tacir, İmparatorluk'un bir Rotacısı ile kendi türünün bile hor gördüğü aşağılık bir zenodan hangisini seçeceğine karar vermekte zorlanmıyorsundur herhâlde."
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader, surely you do not consider this a difficult choice? A Navigator of the Imperium and a xenos rogue despised even by her own kind?"

traits.locale_text: "Hür Tacir, İmparatorluk'un bir Rotacısı ile kendi türünün bile hor gördüğü aşağılık bir zeno arasından seçim yapmakta zorlanmıyorsundur herhâlde."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
